FuncDef:
The subordinate group command configures a group VLAN for a principal VLAN.
The undo subordinate group command deletes a group VLAN from a principal VLAN. The subordinate group command configures a group VLAN for a principal VLAN. The undo subordinate group command deletes a group VLAN from a principal VLAN. By default, no group VLAN is configured for the principal VLAN. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the start VLAN ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4094.

Specifies the end VLAN ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4094.
